resources.string: Here you can access all opened tabs and your data: saved sites on the startpage, bookmarks and history. In the settings you can decide which content will be shown at start.
Long press any saved bookmark to set it as start site. This site will always load on start or when you open a new tab. You can also set an blank start page via the bookmark menu.

On the toolbar and the Navigation button you can use gestures: ▪ Swipe up/down → scroll to top/bottom; ▪ Swipe left/right → navigate back/forward; ▪ Tap → open the menu; ▪ Long press → open Fast toggle dialog You can configure gestures in the settings.

If you long press the \"menu\" or the \"Navigation button\" the \"Fast toggle dialog\" will open. Here you can change some important settings without leaving the current website. You can also add websites to your whitelist for AdBlocker, JavaScript or Cookies..

Manage your tabs, share or save content, handle the current tab or use some features: just try it. The menu can be dismissed, like all other notifications, by clicking back, clicking outside the menu or simply be swiping the menu down.
Notifications are displayed on the bottom of the screen. They can also be dismissed like the menus.
There are even more options in the settings. Try it out!

For more information visit the project site on Github: https://github.com/eolme/browser-suze
